# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #14](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#14)

#### Sweetness

Just after the Shattering (but before they started created humans or something), did all Shards have roughly the same amount of raw power?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes. Good question.
